sentences.en: A rat can gnaw a hole through wood.
A rat had gnawed a hole in the box.
sentences.cn: 老鼠在箱子上咬了一个洞。

sentences.en: Department of green tile brick temple built by the descendants call the " ant gnaw temple. "
sentences.cn: 庙宇系青砖绿瓦所筑,后人呼为 “ 蚂咋神庙 ”.
德克斯特若有所思地咬着钢笔。

sentences.en: Dogs like to gnaw on a bone.
Gnaw: This ghoul ability is now able to be set on autocast.
sentences.cn: 啃咬: 这个食尸鬼技能可以设置为自动施放.

sentences.en: He looked about for something to gnaw on. The last onion?
sentences.cn: 他找找四周有什么能啃一口的东西. 最后一点洋葱?

sentences.en: Lions like to gnaw away at a piece of meat.
sentences.cn: 狮子喜欢不断地啃着一块肉.

sentences.en: Our dog likes to gnaw a bone.
Two mice, one white and one black, little by little started to gnaw away the vine.
sentences.cn: 两只老鼠, 一黑一白, 开始一点点地把野藤咬断.

sentences.en: Woodlice attack living plants and gnaw at the stems.
sentences.cn: 木虱会侵害活体植物并啃咬它们的茎。

sentences.en: You'd like that, so your conscience won't gnaw at you anymore.
sentences.cn: 你喜欢这样么, 你的内心是这么 想 的么?

words.tran_cn: 腐食物；咬噬者；臼齿动物，啮齿动物

trans.tran_cn: 咬，啮，使苦恼，折磨，侵蚀，使腐蚀
